tool_description: Analyzes taxonomy structure and provides insights on hierarchy balance, category distribution, and potential optimization opportunities.

taxonomy_id.description: Identifier of the taxonomy to analyze

include_product_counts.description: Whether to include product count statistics per category

depth_analysis.description: Whether to perform detailed depth and balance analysis

error_messages: Invalid taxonomy ID: The specified taxonomy does not exist or is not accessible
Analysis failed: Unable to process the taxonomy structure
Empty taxonomy: The taxonomy contains no categories to analyze
usage: Provide taxonomy_id and optionally enable detailed analysis options. The tool returns comprehensive taxonomy metrics and recommendations.

analysis_summary.description: Overall analysis summary and key findings

total_categories.description: Total number of categories in taxonomy

max_depth.description: Maximum depth of the taxonomy hierarchy

avg_depth.description: Average depth across all leaf categories
